 Alphah :
Alphah  hop in and said "Then... Will we go to save Condor?"
  warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: AzureBlade: Yes. That is what Alpha was talking about when I was 
inside her. Hold on a second. Send us your location, we will be right 
there.

He transforms to jet mode and tells Alpha:

AzureBlade: Hop in, Alpha. As soon as I get Prowl's coordinates, I'll 
take off to meet him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> "The city is repairing itself. The nano bots should have it finished
> soon. And I know of the bot, that was reprogramed. Condor, right?"
